name: LineageOS
changelog:
• Updated to April ASB.
  • Improved smoothness and memory usage.
  • Silenced more logging in the kernel.
  • Minor optimizations.
notes:
• This update breaks compatibility with previous custom kernels, including 912 and older NoName versions. Attempting to flash these kernels will lead to a bootloop. This issue stems from our kernel being deprecated by Google in QPR2, requiring backports from newer kernel versions to boot.
  • Due to the enormous update the following features are removed (I will try to add them back in the future):
    • QS data usage
    • Lockscreen clock customization
    • 3 finger swipe screenshot
  • Skyblueborb is also maintaining LineageOS 18.1.
